raw_text: MAHASEN WIJESUNDERA – Loving husband of Dushyanthi Wijesundera,​ beloved father of Resuree and Baavika,​ son of late Mr & Mrs C.A. Wijesundera,​ brother of Parakrama,​ Padmini and late Indira. Remains lie at ‘The Restpect’,​ Jayaratne Funeral Parlour,​ Bauddhaloka Mw.,​ Colombo 08 from 3 p.m. on Thursday 13th July. Cremation on the 14th July at 4.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.043275

NITA CLARICE FERNANDO (SHIRLEY) – Beloved wife of Linton (decd.),​ beloved mother of Nishantha (CBA),​ mother-in-law of Kumudini,​ grandmother of Nadeesh and Sadathani (Australia) and Nimesh (Commercial Bank),​ sister of Herbert and Eric (decd.),​ called to Rest with Jesus. Funeral Service on Friday 14th July at residence at 3.30 p.m. and at Moratumulla Methodist Church at 4.30 p.m. Burial at Moratumulla Methodist Church Burial Ground. 31A,​ 2nd Lane,​ Kadalana,​ Moratuwa.042970

SIRIWARDENE SAVITHRIE (nee ABEYSEKERA) Loving wife of Ranjith de Zoysa Siriwardene,​ mother of Suren & Shanil,​ mother-in-law of Sachini Kamalendran. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on 14th July 2023 from 8 a.m. onwards,​ burial at 4 p.m. at General Cemetery Borella Roman Catholic Section.043117

SIVANANDARAJAH – S. (S. RAJAH) – Founder /​ Chairman International Education Consultancy – (IEC). Beloved husband of Mary De Silva,​ loving father of Roshan De Silva and Manjula Perera (IEC),​ father-in-law of Nalin Perera,​ grandfather of Angelo Perera,​ Denham Perera,​ Lizelle Jayawardana and Tasheeka De Silva,​ great-grandfather of Rahen. Remains lie at No. 17/​4,​ Holy Cross Avenue,​ Moratuwa for viewing from 10 a.m. on 13th July. Cortege leaves residence for Burial on 14 July at 4 p.m. at St. Joseph’s Church,​ Uyana,​ Moratuwa. May God grand eternal peace to his soul.042933
